description:
Draw borders around labels.

For each label, finds all edges on the mesh that cross the boundary of the label, and draws borders through them.  By default, this is done on all columns in the input file, using the map name as the class name for the border.

surface.title: surface
surface.description: the surface to use for neighbor information

opt_placement_fraction.title: opt_placement_fraction
opt_placement_fraction.description: set how far along the edge border points are drawn: fraction along edge from inside vertex (default 0.33)

opt_column_column.title: opt_column_column
opt_column_column.description: select a single column: the column number or name
